Pre-Game Insights: Vedat Muriqi spoke highly of Romania and Mircea Lucescu, expressing respect for the Romanian team and anticipating a challenging match.
Vedat Muriqi discussed the importance of mental strength in the upcoming match against Romania.
Others: The match between Kosovo and Romania will take place on September 6, 2024, and can be watched on Digi Sport 1.
Vedat Muriqi expressed appreciation for Romania's federation's complaint to UEFA regarding incidents from the previous match between the two teams.
